医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
NIH 拨款 439 万美元用于研究心房肌病和痴呆症之间的联系Lin Yee Chen，医学博士、理学硕士，明尼苏达大学医学院教授兼 Lillehei 心脏研究所所长，获得美国国立卫生研究院 439 万美元的资助，用于研究心房肌病——一种与心房肌病相关的心脏病。患痴呆症和血管性脑损伤的风险较高。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231010/24439-million-NIH-grant-awarded-to-study-the-link- Between-atrial-myopathy-and-dementia.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231010/24439-million-NIH-grant-awarded-to-study-the-link- Between-atrial-myopathy-and-dementia.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=212b06fa-b2d8-4d2b-b245-5fd2c7bd28ca Tue, 10 Oct 2023 16:08:07 -0400 $4.39 million NIH grant awarded to study the link between atrial myopathy and dementia

研究表明巨噬细胞在肠道细胞更新中发挥核心作用来自维也纳 MedUni 和 FWF 资助的特殊研究领域 SFB F83 免疫代谢的研究小组现已首次证明了巨噬细胞在肠道细胞更新中的核心作用，这揭示了免疫细胞和组织再生之间复杂的相互作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231010/Macrophages-play-a-central-role-in-intestinal-cell-renewal-study-reveals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231010/Macrophages-play-a-central-role-in-intestinal-cell-renewal-study-reveals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=144194ff-adf3-42fa-97fb-f67292fac47d Tue, 10 Oct 2023 15:17:47 -0400 Macrophages play a central role in intestinal cell renewal, study reveals
新的人工智能工具可以帮助诊断神秘的罕见疾病一种基于人工智能的创新工具利用各种症状描述以及科学文献和基因组数据集中的证据来查明与疾病相关的基因变异。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231010/New-AI-tool-could-aid-in-the-diagnosis-of-enigmatic-rare-diseases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231010/New-AI-tool-could-aid-in-the-diagnosis-of-enigmatic-rare-diseases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a044f727-dfa2-4e6d-b042-c12e6909fa61 Tue, 10 Oct 2023 15:01:43 -0400 New AI tool could aid in the diagnosis of enigmatic rare diseases

数千人接受了 Exactech 膝关节或髋关节置换手术。然后，患者说，这些部件开始出现故障。罗恩·厄比 (Ron Irby) 预计 2018 年 9 月植入他右腿的人工膝关节将持续二十年，甚至更长。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231010/Thousands-got-Exactech-knee-or-hip-replacements-Then-病人-say-the-parts-began-to-fail.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231010/Thousands-got-Exactech-knee-or-hip-replacements-Then-病人-say-the-parts-began-to-fail.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=79f5c393-5cc8-4c07-98ae-a0ee7749c264 Tue, 10 Oct 2023 12:52:03 -0400 Thousands got Exactech knee or hip replacements. Then, patients say, the parts began to fail.
